```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggthemes)
library(ggforce)
library(glue)
library(showtext)
font_add_google("Teko")
font_add_google("Lato")

showtext_opts(dpi = 320)
showtext_auto()
```


```{r}
meteorites <- readr::read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2019/2019-06-11/meteorites.csv")
```


```{r}
meteorites %>%
  count(mass, sort = T) %>% 
  arrange(-mass)
 
top <- meteorites %>% 
  top_n(8, mass) %>% 
  arrange(-mass) %>% 
  select(mass, fall, year, name, lat, long) %>% 
  pivot_wider(id_cols = c(name, mass, lat, long), names_from = fall, values_from = year)

small_mass <-  meteorites %>% 
  filter(mass < 24000000)

annotations <- top %>% 
  filter(mass >= 50000000) %>% 
  mutate(description = glue("Mass: {mass/1000000} tons\nFound: {Found}"))
```
### Source[NASA Color Codes] (https://nasa.github.io/nasawds-site/components/colors/) 
### Source[tidytuesday by ch-bu] (https://github.com/ch-bu/tidytuesday/blob/master/2019-06-12/meteorites.R)

```{r}
world <- ggplot() +
  borders("world", color = "#94bfa2", fill = "#2e8540") +
  coord_map(projection = "mollweid", 
            orientation = c(90, 0, 0)) +
  geom_point(data = top, 
             na.rm = T,
             color = "#99231b",
             aes(long, lat, size = mass),
             alpha = 1) +
  geom_text(data = top,
             aes(x = long, y = lat,
                label = name), 
            color = "white",
            family = "Teko",
            fontface = "bold",
             size = 4, hjust = 1.2) +
  geom_mark_circle(data = annotations, 
                   aes(long +.22, lat +.22,
                       label = toupper(name),
                       description = description),
                   expand = unit(2, "mm"), 
                   label.fill = "#5b616b", 
                   label.colour = "#aeb0b5", 
                   con.colour = "#d6d7d9", 
                   label.margin = margin(2, 3, 2, 15, "mm")) +
  geom_point(data = small_mass, 
             na.rm = T,
             color = "#e59892",
             aes(long, lat, size = mass),
             alpha = .1) +
  labs(title = "Meteorites Impacts on Earth",
       subtitle = "Red dot represents meteorites impacts with a mass bigger than 24tons.",
       caption = "Source: NASA | Graphic: Sung Inkyung") +
  theme_map() +
  theme(legend.position = "none",
        plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#061f4a",
                                       color = NA),
        panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#061f4a",
                                        color = NA),
        plot.title = element_text(family = "Teko", size = 32, face = "bold", hjust = .5, color = "#a6e5d8",
                                  margin = margin(b = 11)),
        plot.subtitle = element_text(family = "Lato", size = 20, hjust = .5, color = "#a6e5d8",
                                     margin = margin(b = 20)),
        plot.caption = element_text(family = "Lato", size = 11, color = "#dce4ef", hjust = 0.95,
                                    margin = margin(t = 10)),
        plot.margin = margin(10, 10, 10, 10))

ggsave("W24_MeteoritesImpacts.png", width = 28, height = 23, units = "cm")
```
